program.name: Net-SSLeay
program.configure:
OPENSSL_PREFIX=${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL} ${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl \ Makefile.PL PREFIX=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in ia64*-hpux*) # override alternate crypto/ssl lib in /usr/lib/hpux32 ${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ /^LDDLFLAGS/ s!\(-L/usr/lib/hpux32\)!-L${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB} \1!;" \ Makefile ;; *-osf*) # Need -B symbolic to avoid SEGV ${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ /^LDDLFLAGS/ s!LDDLFLAGS =!LDDLFLAGS = -Wl,-B,symbolic!;" Makefile ;; esac
program.uninstall:
_installsitearch=$(${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl -e \ 'use Config; print $Config{"installsitearch"} . "\n";')
cat ${_installsitearch}/auto/Net/SSLeay/.packlist |\ while read _file; do rm ${_file}
_dir=$(dirname ${_file}) test -d ${_dir} && rmdir ${_dir} 2>/dev/null done
rm ${_installsitearch}/auto/Net/SSLeay/.packlist rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/Net/SSLeay rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/Net 2>/dev/null
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ /head2.*L<Net::SSLeay|/,/back/ { g N d }" ${_installsitearch}/perllocal.pod
